short_name: Motion Art For Elementor Wordpress Plugin Preview - CodeCanyon
name: A motion art effect is a captivating and interactive visual enhancement that involves the creation of simulated smoke or mist-like particles, which dynamically respond to the movement of the user's mouse cursor. This effect is designed to provide an engaging and immersive experience for website visitors, elevating the overall appeal and interactivity of the user interface. By incorporating this effect, websites can evoke a sense of intrigue and fascination, effectively drawing users into the digital space and encouraging them to interact with the content in a more dynamic and experiential manner.
